comment: Please for all souls who have lost all hope . May it come to be that via His good Son heals them and brings them back to whole . If you have time , PLEASE pray ... PRAY for a !
amr:
# ::snt Please for all souls who have lost all hope . May it come to be that via His good Son heals them and brings them back to whole . If you have time , PLEASE pray ... PRAY for a !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / please
            :polite +
            :beneficiary (s / soul
                  :ARG0-of (l / lose-02
                        :ARG1 (h / hopeful-03
                              :mod (a / all)))
                  :mod (a2 / all)))
      :snt2 (w / wish-01
            :ARG1 (c / come-04
                  :ARG1 (t / that)
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (h2 / heal-01
                              :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (h4 / he)
                                          :ARG2 (s2 / son
                                                :ARG1-of (g / good-02))))
                              :ARG1 s)
                        :op2 (b / bring-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 s
                              :ARG3 (w2 / whole)
                              :direction (b2 / back))))
            :snt3 (p3 / pray-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :condition (h5 / have-03
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (t2 / time)))))

comment: I pray God will encourage all those who are discouraged ! ! ! I pray for HOPE to RISE ! I pray for Renewed COURAGE , Bravery and JOY ! ! ! In Jesus Name Amens ! ! !
amr:
# ::snt I pray God will encourage all those who are discouraged ! ! ! I pray for HOPE to RISE ! I pray for Renewed COURAGE , Bravery and JOY ! ! ! In Jesus Name Amens ! ! !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / pray-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (e / encourage-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "God"))
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :mod (t / that)
                        :ARG1-of (d / discourage-01)
                        :mod (a / all))))
      :snt2 (p4 / pray-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (h / hope-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (r / rise-01
                        :ARG0 ii2)))
      :snt3 (p5 / pray-01
            :ARG0 ii2
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c / cure-01)
                  :op2 (b / Bravery)
                  :op3 (j / jOY)
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / renew-01)))
      :snt4 (a3 / Amens
            :mode expressive
            :mod (n2 / name
                  :poss (p6 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Jesus")))))
